mean_cn: adj. 田园生活的，牧师的
mean_en: of or relating to the countryside or to the lives of people who live in the country
word_etyma: pastor牧师 + al形容词后缀 → pastoral 牧师的
short_phrase: a pastoral job on the farm
sentence: This is a typical relaxing pastoral scene of the countryside.
sentence_trans: 这种舒适的田园风光是乡村景色的典型。
